name: Celery Root And Potatoes Dauphinoise
keywords: celery root, potato, fall, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large buttered gratin dish, arrange the slices of potato and celery root, adding a little butter, salt and pepper to each row as you go. Top with cream, salt and pepper and cook until the vegetables are tender and the top has lightly browned (about 45 minutes).
